title: Countries to reconvene sooner to accelerate progress on WHO Pathogen Access and Benefit Sharing system negotiations
summary: WHO Member States today ended their latest round of intensive negotiations on the world’s first Pathogen Access andBenefit Sharing (PABS) system. Countries decided to resume deliberations in January in a reflection of the shared commitment and urgency needed to help make the world safer from future pandemics.
